Verses: 1 indha Nadapadigalukkuppinbu, Raajaavaagiya Agaasveru Ammedhaaththaavin Kumaaranaagiya Aamaan Ennum Aagaagiyanai Menmaippaduththi, Thannidaththilirukkira Sagala Prabukkalukkum Melaaga Avanudaiya Aasanaththai Uyarththivaiththaan.

2 aagaiyaal Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalilirukkira Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarum Aamaanai Vanangi Namaskariththu Vandhaargal; Avanukku Ippadi Seyyavendum Endru Raajaa Kattalaiyittirundhaan; Aanaalum Mordhegaai Avanai Vanangavumillai, Namaskarikkavumillai.
3 appozhudhu Raajaavin Aramanai Vaasalilirukkira Raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Mordhegaayaip Paarththu: Nee Raajaavin Kattalaiyai Meerugiradhu Enna Endru Kettaargal.

4 ippadi Avargal Naalukkunaal Avanudane Solliyum, Avan Thangalukku Sevikodaadhapodhu, Thaan Yoodhan Endru Avan Avargalukku Ariviththirundhapadiyaal, Mordhegaayin Sorkal Nilainirkumo Endru Paarkkiradharku, Adhai Aamaanukku Ariviththaargal.
5 aamaan Mordhegaai Thannai Vanangi Namaskariyaadhadhaik Kandapodhu, Moorkkam Niraindhavanaanaan.

6 aanaalum Mordhegaayinmel Maaththiram Kaipoduvadhu Avanukku Arpakkaariyamaagak Kandadhu; Mordhegaayin Janangal Innaarendru Aamaanukku Arivikkappattirundhapadiyaal, Agaasveruvin Raajyamengum Irukkira Mordhegaayin Janamaagiya Yoodharaiyellaam Sangarikka Avan Vagaithedinaan.

7 raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvin Pannirandaam Varusham Nisaan Maadhamaagiya Mudhalaam Maadhaththile Aamaanukku Munbaagap Poor Ennappatta Seettu Ovvoru Naalaiyum Ovvorumaadhaththaiyum Kuriththup Podappattu, Aadhaar Maadhamaana Pannirandaam Maadhaththinmel Vizhundhadhu.

8 appozhudhu Aamaan Agaasveru Raajaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Raajyaththin Sagala Naadugalilumulla Janangalukkulle Oruvidha Janangal Sidharundu Parambiyirukkiraargal; Avargaludaiya Vazhakkangal Sagala Janangaludaiya Vazhakkangalukkum Vigarpamaayirukkiradhu; Avargal Raajaavin Sattangalaik Kaikkollugiradhillai; Aagaiyaal Avargalai Ippadi Vittirukkiradhu Raajaavukku Nyaayamalla.

9 raajaavukku Sammadhiyaanaal, Avargalai Azhikkavendumendru Ezhudhi Anuppavendiyadhu; Appozhudhu Naan Raajaavin Kajaanaavile Konduvandhu Seluththa Padhinaayiram Thaalandhu Velliyai Ennik Kaariyakkaarar Kaiyil Koduppen Endraan.
10 appozhudhu Raajaa Than Kaiyilirukkira Than Modhiraththaik Kazhatri, Adhai Aagaagiyanaana Ammedhaaththaavin Kumaaranum Yoodharin Saththuruvumaagiya Aamaanidaththil Koduththu,
11 aamaanai Nokki: Andha Velliyai Nee Vaiththukkol; Andha Janaththukku Un Ishtappadi Seyyalaam Endraan.

12 mudhalaam Maadham Padhinmoondraanthedhiyile, Raajaavin Sambiradhigal Azhaikkappattaargal; Aamaan Karpiththapadiyellaam Raajaavin Dhesaadhipadhigalukkum, Ovvoru Naattinmel Vaikkappattirundha Thuraigalukkum, Ovvoru Janaththin Prabukkalukkum, Andhandha Naattil Vazhangum Atcharaththilum, Andhandha Jaadhiyaar Pesum Baashaiyilum Ezhudhappattadhu; Raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvinperaal Adhu Ezhudhappattu, Raajaavin Modhiraththinaal Muththirai Podappattadhu.

13 aadhaar Maadhamaana Pannirandaam Maadham Padhinmoondraanthedhiyaagiya Orenaalile Siriyor Periyor Kuzhandhaigal Sthreegal Aagiya Sagala Yoodharaiyum Azhiththuk Kondru Nirmoolamaakkavum, Avargalaik Kollaiyidavum, Anjarkaarar Kaiyile Raajaavin Naadugalukkellaam Kattalaigal Anuppappattadhu.
14 andha Naalukku Aayaththappattirukkavendum Endru Sagala Janangalukkum Koori Arivikkiradharkaagak Kodukkappatta Kattalaiyin Nagal Idhuve, Idhu Ovvoru Naattilum Prasiththampannappattadhu.

15 andha Anjarkaarar Raajaavin Uththaravinaal Theeviramaaip Purappattupponaargal; Andhak Kattalai Soosaan Aramanaiyil Pirandhadhu. Raajaavum Aamaanum Kudikkumpadi Utkaarndhaargal; Soosaan Nagaram Kalangitru.
